description.ko: 유리와 강철의 프리즘을 통해 비에 젖은 미래의 네온 박동을 바라보는 고요한 디지털 로맨스의 순간입니다.
description.en: A quiet moment of digital romance, watching the neon pulse of a rain-streaked future through a prism of glass and steel.

prompt: A high-tech interior view of a futuristic glass atrium overlooking a rain-soaked cyberpunk megacity at night. The windows are covered in hyper-realistic raindrops that distort the vibrant pink and cyan neon lights from the urban spires below. Textures of wet carbon fiber and brushed hyper-alloy contrast with the soft glow of holographic interfaces. 8k, Unreal Engine 5, raytracing. Cinematic volumetric fog and global illumination capture the digital romance of the city, with a sharp focus on the interplay between the metallic interior and the neon-drenched exterior.
